description.p: Get the date value NrOfDays days ahead of Date.

prototypes.prototype: AddDaysToDate as D (Date as D, NrOfDays as N)

discussion.p: The AddDaysToDate Portable SQL function computes a new date by adding days to a date field.

example.caption: AddDaysToDate() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 CurrentDate() AS Now, AddDaysToDate(CurrentDate(), 14) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:00:00 00 am|10/24/2019 12:00:00 00 am
